name: Hello
intro:
每一次电台节目都会有个开场曲，而Hello就是这一张混音带的开场音乐，为雷顿狗新的计画来开幕序曲，灵感来自于一些七零年代个义大利电影音乐和一些电视配乐。

Every radio show has their own song. Hello, is this mixtape project theme song to tell the world that this is my new project and gonna bring you back to some of my favorite eras. Moreover, this song is specially inspired by 70s italian movies and library music.
